<title level="1" right="Rules">[Inclines](/Rules.aspx?ID=2371)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 423 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An incline is an area so steep that you need to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374) using the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) skill in order to progress upward. You’re [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) when Climbing an incline.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
